title: Saidu Adeshina
text:
Saidu Alade Adeshina (born 4 April 1983) is a Nigerian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">Midfielder</a>, currently playing for Swiss club <a href="FC%20Chiasso">Chiasso</a>.
On 3 February 2012 Adeshina was signed by <a href="FC%20Chiasso">Chiasso</a>.
